info.name: Google Docs no floating buttons
info.description:
Remove the floating buttons that pollute Google Docs' simple interface:
- Hide the circular comment buttons that hover over the right-hand margin
- Hide the "Explore" call-to-action in the bottom-right hand corner
- Hide the lower-right button to show Companion (if you've hidden Companion and want to re-show it, disable Stylus temporarily to access the button)
- Hide the "Outline" button in top left corner
- No more floating message to press Esc to leave full screen, every time you enter full screen
info.additionalInfo:
- 2017-03-25: Fixed hiding comment button
- 2017-03-13: Ruler now has correct background color again
- 2018-09-16: Hide the button to show Companion after it's been hidden
- 2019-05-25: Hide the new Outline button at top left corner of work area
- 2020-03-13: Removed dark background CSS (which hadn't worked in a long time) and renamed extension from "Google Docs darker background" so the extension now does only one thing and does it well
- 2020-07-16: Removed extra page shadow which had been left in previous version, and which had been breaking with a Docs update this week
- 2020-12-05: Updated hiding comment button to support new Docs change
